Content: A group of 661 Brigade-based 21 Army personnel, including one Officer in another community project assisted the repair of the roof at Pallai Church in the general area of Pooneryn on Sunday (27). On being informed of the dilapidated condition of the Church roof, 5 Mechanized Infantry Regiment (MIR) troops serving the 661 Brigade of the 66 Division under the Security Force Headquarters – Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) offered their technical and vocational expertise to repair the roof in a Shramadana. Supervised by the 661 Brigade Commander and the 66 Division General Officer Commanding (GOC), the project received the blessings of Major General Ralph Nugera, Commander Security Forces – Kilinochchi (SF-KLN).
